text: Robinhood Markets, Inc. is an American financial services company headquartered in Menlo Park, California. Robinhood is a FINRA-regulated broker-dealer. It is a member of the Securities Investor Protection Corporation. As of 2020, Robinhood had 13 million users. ==References== Category:2010s establishments in California Category:2013 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in California Category:Menlo Park, California Category:American financial companies Category:Online brokerages
title: Robinhood (company)
